p: Erythromycin is the first macrolide proved to have efficacy in the treatment of rhinovirus and influenza virus [ 118]. On the other hand, clarithromycin and azithromycin have shown higher effectivity towards rhinovirus, respiratory syncytial virus, and influenza virus [ 118, 119]. In addition, Zika and Ebola viruses have been shown to be inhibited by azithromycin [ 120, 121]. During the early phase of influenza virus infection, azithromycin has been found to block influenza virus endocytosis into host cells [ 119].
